attributes.action: End Inactive Animal Products in Medicine and Vaccines
attributes.additional_details:
All inactive animal products in medicine and vaccines should cease and be replaced by plant based alternatives.   Examples of this is the use of lactose in tablets and gelatine in vaccines.

The adding of artificial colours, flavours and sweeteners should also be phased out - and replaced with natural alternatives.

This should not affect the efficiency of the drug in anyway, as only inactive ingredients would be replaced.
